other_tests.findings: Skin involvement by CLL, without evidence of transformation.
Lymphocyte predominance by CLL; 3% of cells were positive for CD38.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Later flow cytometry confirmed CLL; however, 50% of B cells were CD38 positive.

other_tests.findings: Drainage of left pleural and pericardial fluid showed CLL cells, but no evidence of Richter's transformation.
Extensive granulation tissue and mesothelial proliferation consistent with chronic effusion; no evidence of large cell transformation or infection.
other_tests.changes_over_time: CLL was regarded as a 'bystander' and not the cause of the pleural effusion.

other_tests.procedure_name: Blood cultures and viral load tests
other_tests.findings: All cultures negative for infections including CMV, adenovirus, EBV, Parvo 19 DNA, HHV-8, and respiratory viruses.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Resolution of fever noted post therapies.
